description.ruby-sapphire:
Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row
to strike the foe.
description.emerald:
Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row
to strike the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user shoots
seeds at the foe.
Two to five seeds
are shot at once.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user forcefully
shoots seeds at the
foe. Two to five
seeds are shot in
rapid succession.
description.platinum:
The user forcefully
shoots seeds at the
foe. Two to five
seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

The user forcefully
shoots seeds at the
foe. Two to five
seeds are shot in
rapid succession.
description.black-white:

target. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

The user forcefully shoots seeds at the
target. Two to five seeds are shot in

description.x-y:

target two to five times in a row.

The user forcefully shoots seeds at the
target two to five times in a row.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
